results.definition: a piece of thin and flexible sheet metal
examples: the photographic film was wrapped in foil

results.definition: anything that serves by contrast to call attention to another thing's good qualities
examples: pretty girls like plain friends as foils

results.definition: a device consisting of a flat or curved piece (as a metal plate) so that its surface reacts to the water it is passing through
examples: the fins of a fish act as hydrofoils

results.definition: picture consisting of a positive photograph or drawing on a transparent base; viewed with a projector
a light slender flexible sword tipped by a button

examples: In this picture, the figures are foiled against the background

results.definition: hinder or prevent (the efforts, plans, or desires) of
examples: What ultimately frustrated every challenger was Ruth's amazing September surge
